snippet: A five-story townhouse that retains many original details, but also some bold, modern renovations, is poised to enter the market at $12 million.
abstract: Cleverly conceived hybrid five-story townhouse on a classic Upper West Side block near the American Museum of Natural History is poised to enter the market at $12 million.
lead_paragraph: A five-story townhouse that retains many original details, but also some bold, modern renovations, is poised to enter the market at $12 million.

headline.main: Upper West Side Brownstone With Modern Twists
